alert.note: Alert for Dent; Howell; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:01AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Shannon, eastern Dent, northern Howell and southeastern Texas Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 901 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Mountain View, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Plains, Current River State Park, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Echo Bluff State Park, Mountain View, Willow Springs, Winona, Birch Tree, Eminence, Pomona, Summersville, Bunker, Montier, Teresita, Jadwin, Howes Mill, Midridge, Pottersville, Gladden and Eunice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Missouri. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Missouri.
